summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Department of Health and Human Services outlines 35 open recommendations that it should prioritize. For example, HHS should complete a comprehensive, national risk assessment of the potential for improper payments in the Medicaid program...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Health and Human Services
